doc:
Albert Rémy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_R%C3%A9my 0 Albert Rémy (9 April 1921 – 26 January 1967) was a French actor best known for his supporting roles in François Truffaut's first two feature films. He played Antoine Doinel's father in The 400 Blows and Charlie Koller's (Charles Aznavour) brother in Shoot the Piano Player. He also appeared in Marcel Carné's Les Enfants du Paradis, John Frankenheimer's The Train and René Clément's Is Paris Burning?. Albert_Rémy ( 9_April_1921 – 26_January_1967 ) was a_French_actor best_known for his_supporting_roles in François_Truffaut 's_first_two_feature_films . He played Antoine_Doinel 's_father in The_400_Blows and Charlie_Koller 's_(_Charles_Aznavour_)_brother in Shoot the_Piano_Player . He also appeared in Marcel_Carné 's_Les_Enfants_du_Paradis , John_Frankenheimer 's_The_Train and René_Clément 's_Is_Paris_Burning ? .
